ModMetaData.name: Prosthetic Didgets (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Actual Trashs mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1507137970
- Cleaned up the code and made use of the vanilla definitions instead. - Moved bionic-digits to Fabrication Bench (thanks younyokel) - Added a medival tier with lower efficency - Added Brazilian Portuguese translation, thanks Nem te conto!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/ProstheticDidgets][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
[b]Ever try to go toe-to-toe with a scyther, only to end up going stub-to-stub? Confused on why you have to replace an entire [i]arm[/i] just to solve the problem of a missing thumb? Well boy howdy, I have the mod for you![/b]
Prosthetic fingers and toes, the solution to a few missing didgets. Now craftable at your nearest machining bench for only a mere 10 steel and 1 component!
Credits to Arkamedes on the RW Discord for the preview image.
[strike](bionic fingers coming soon™)[/strike]
Non-steam: https://www.dropbox.com/s/y0rdf2o095akdyo/prosthetic%20didgets%20updated.zip?dl=0 B18 Version: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1293881397 B19 Version: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ts8od675igwzqgd/prosthetic%20didgetsb19.zip?dl=0
[b]Patch Notes[/b]:
[b]Update 0-[/b] -Initial Release
[b]Update 1-[/b] -Fixed a problem where the mod would fart out errors on boot-up. Should not do that anymore.
[b]Update 2-[/b] -Bionic fingers! -[i]-Craftable for only 10 plasteel and 2 components + their prosthetic equivelant.[/i] -[i]-Only 110% efficent, this may be changed later.[/i] -Added colors to the hediffs, very pretty. -Bug-fixing! -[i]-Everything should be properly craftable now.[/i] -[i]-Changed base titles, this *should* mean the mod plays nicer with other mods now. Probably does nothing.[/i]
[b]Update 3-[/b] -Balancing! -[i]-Increased market value of bionic prosthetics.[/i] -[i]-Bionic fingers now have an efficiency of 100%, but give +0.4 manipulation. This means that a full hand should give about +20% manipulation.[/i] -[i]-Bionic toes now have an efficiency of 100%, but give +0.4 movement speed. This means that a full foot should give about +20% movement speed.[/i] -Misc Updates -[i]-About file now displays version number.[/i]
[b]Update 4-[/b] -[i]-Updated to B19![/i]
[b]Update 5-[/b] -[i]-Finally updated to 1.0.[/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
